item.title: Golang Local Module with OOP
item.description: Create location of your go code 1~$ mkdir /mnt/c/learning/go Get the suggested golang init script It is in separate post in my quicktasks and don't forget to make it executable. For this quicktask, I assume you named it init.sh as well. Create and go to project directory 1~$ mkdir local_module_example 2~$ cd local_module_example Initialize Go environment 1../init.sh Create module location directory 1~$ mkdir -p example.local/person Create the module This is module person
